summary: Two cab drivers search San Francisco's Chinatown for the mysterious Chan, who disappeared with their $4000.
cast: Wood Moy|Marc Hayashi|Laureen Chew|Peter Wang|Presco Tabios|Frankie Alarcon|Judi Nihei|Ellen Yeung|George Woo|Emily Woo Yamasaki|Virginia Cerenio|Roy Chan|Leong Pui Chee
keywords: national film registry|chinatown san francisco|taxi driver|missing person|search
title: Chan Is Missing
